trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Inserted" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Updated" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Deleted" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per gli eventi <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Inserted" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Updated" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Deleted" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> used by the data source.
The context used by the data source.
Gets the object that was added, modified, or updated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto aggiunto, modificato o aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the entity.
Gets the exception that was thrown during the insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione generata durante l'operazione di inserimento, aggiornamento o eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Eccezione, se si è verificato un errore; in caso contrario, un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'eccezione è stata gestita e non deve essere nuovamente generata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the exception was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'eccezione è stata gestita; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.
